name: Space Art, or something
description:
"Space Art, or something" is a tech demo of an algorithm developed as an exam project of the "Algorithms for Game Development" course at the IT University of Copenhagen in Spring 2021. This has this been developed as part of our Masters-degree in Games Technology.

The game is a simple sculpting simulator, except the person sculpting is really bad at it, and it is in space, and has some soothing music to get you in the right mindset.
